Posts.Content: kpdahope wrote: I am asking for my wife who is dxed with stage IIIa bc and went thru very aggressive traetment with mastectomy, chemo and radiation.  she is in remission for the last 4 years.  The recent CT scan showed a small cyst in her liver.  We are going to see the onc in two weeks.  Could any one with similar situation past or present share what does cyst in liver mean.  We're very anxious until we see the onc.  thanks! Posts.Title: BC and cyst in liver....a concern?? kpdahope YATCOMW
